00050 typedef KviStatusBarApplet * (*CreateAppletCallback)(KviStatusBar *, KviStatusBarAppletDescriptor *);
00051 
00052 class KVIRC_API KviStatusBarAppletDescriptor : public KviHeapObject
00053 {
00054         friend class KviStatusBar;
00055         friend class KviStatusBarApplet;
00056 protected:
00057         QString                          m_szVisibleName;       // visible name of the applet
00058         QString                          m_szInternalName;      // UNIQUE name of the applet
00059         QString                          m_szPreloadModule;     // name of the module that must be preloaded for this applet
00060         CreateAppletCallback             m_pProc;               // creation callback
00061         QPixmap                        * m_pIcon;
00062         int                              m_iId;
00063         KviPointerList<KviStatusBarApplet> * m_pAppletList;
00064 public:
00065         KviStatusBarAppletDescriptor(const QString & szVisibleName,
00066                                         const QString & szInternalName,
00067                                         CreateAppletCallback pProc,
00068                                         const QString & szPreloadModule = QString(),
00069                                         const QPixmap & pixIcon = QPixmap());
00070         virtual ~KviStatusBarAppletDescriptor();
00071 public:
00072         const QString & visibleName(){ return m_szVisibleName; };
00073         const QString & internalName(){ return m_szInternalName; };
00074         const QString & preloadModule(){ return m_szPreloadModule; };
00075         int id(){ return m_iId; };
00076         QPixmap * icon(){ return m_pIcon; };
00077 protected:
00078         KviStatusBarApplet * create(KviStatusBar * pBar);
00079         void registerApplet(KviStatusBarApplet * a);
00080         void unregisterApplet(KviStatusBarApplet * a);
00081 };

00084 class KVIRC_API KviStatusBarApplet : public QLabel
00085 {
00086         friend class KviStatusBar;
00087         Q_OBJECT
00088 protected:
00089         KviStatusBar                 * m_pStatusBar;
00090         KviStatusBarAppletDescriptor * m_pDescriptor;
00091         bool                           m_bSelected;
00092         int mIndex;
00093 public:
00094         KviStatusBarApplet(KviStatusBar * pParent, KviStatusBarAppletDescriptor * pDescriptor);
00095         virtual ~KviStatusBarApplet();
00096 public:
00097         KviStatusBar * statusBar(){ return m_pStatusBar; };
00098         KviFrame * frame(){ return m_pStatusBar->frame(); };
00099         KviStatusBarAppletDescriptor * descriptor(){ return m_pDescriptor; };
00100         void setIndex(int i){ mIndex=i; };
00101         int index(){ return mIndex; };
00102         void select(bool bSelect = true);
00103         bool isSelected(){ return m_bSelected; };
00104 protected:
00105         virtual void paintEvent(QPaintEvent * e);
00106 
00107         virtual void fillContextPopup(KviTalPopupMenu *){};
00108         virtual void loadState(const char *, KviConfig *){};
00109         virtual void saveState(const char *, KviConfig *){};
00110         virtual QString tipText(const QPoint &);
00111 };
